nodes.text: Rancor sauce was a sauce used for seasoning of noodles. For the human and Mon Calamari species, it was a taste that was weird to even imagine. When they came in contact with Sakhet of the Rebel Alliance in Sakhet's noodle shop on the planet Denon, Luke Skywalker and Nakari Kelen were ordered to order "Rancor sauce with Corellian buckwheat noodles" as a password.
